newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: CZECH 4-WK T-BILL GROSS YIELD DIPS TO 14.1 PCT.
newsitem.headline: CZECH 4-WK T-BILL GROSS YIELD DIPS TO 14.1 PCT.

text.p: Average gross yield in an auction of a five billion crown tranche of four-week Czech treasury bills on Wednesday dipped to 14.1 percent from 15.8 percent on July 23, the Czech National bank said.
It said the total nominal amount of bills sold was 10 billion crowns on demand of 13.423 billion crowns, though five billion of that was put into the finance ministry portfolio.
The limit yield on bids was set at 14.5 percent.
